title: When I Loved You - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Businessmen   Character Growth   Charming Protagonist   Couple Growth   Devoted Love Interests   Doctors   Doting Love Interests   Early Romance   Engagement   Familial Love   Family   Female Protagonist   First Love   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Marriage   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   Popular Love Interests   R-15   Second Chance   Slow Romance   Wealthy Characters
author: Ryu Hyang   류향
description:
Yoon Yiyoung’s schedule is packed with work to the point that she hasn’t found the chance to go out on a date. One day her friend recommends her to attend a blind date not knowing that she would meet a man she once knew.

That man was Cha Muyeol, the current director of S Group’s shareholding company’s headquarter and director of S Group Medical. They had also once shared a moment in their youth.

After having separated and forging a path of their own for the past 13 years, Cha Muyeol had come to fulfill the promise they made in their past: marriage.>
